org.apache.gora.accumulo.encoders

Class HexEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.accumulo.encoders.HexEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encoder

    public class HexEncoder
extends Object
implements Encoder
    Encodes data in a ascii hex representation
